title: Elon Musk says the AI 'supersonic tsunami' will eliminate desk jobs 'at a very rapid pace'
description: xAI CEO Elon Musk said there will be "a lot of trauma and disruption," but it is possible to have a future where work is optional.
content:
Elon Musk said AI will make desk jobs now feel like when workers used to make calculations by hand before the computer age.
